post1.title: Making room for a slow transition
post1.excerpt: How do you honour family expectations while designing a UK-based career change? Try these questions to choose your own timing.
prompts: What part of your story needs to be witnessed before you make another decision?
Which experiment would feel respectful to your current energy?

post2.title: Bridging languages at work
post2.excerpt: Using bilingual coaching prompts to align UK workplace norms with Chinese cultural wisdom without burning out.
prompts: What language helps you express doubt without apology?
Where do you need a boundary so your multilingual skills stay joyful?
